cameraCapture.title: Camera Recording
cameraCapture.description: Record video from your camera with selected resolution and frame rate.
cameraCapture.permissionDenied: Camera and microphone access denied. Please allow access in browser settings.
cameraCapture.deviceNotFound: Camera or microphone not found. Please connect devices and try again.
cameraCapture.errorGettingCapabilities: Failed to get camera capabilities. Using default settings.
cameraCapture.errorRequestingStream: Failed to get stream with requested resolution. Trying to get stream with default settings.
cameraCapture.errorRequestingStreamFallback: Failed to get camera stream. Please check your camera settings and permissions.
cameraCapture.videoElementError: Error initializing video element. Please try another device or resolution.
cameraCapture.cameraInitError: Error initializing camera. Please check your camera settings and permissions.
cameraCapture.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support camera recording
cameraCapture.mediaDevicesNotSupported: Media devices are not supported in this browser

cameraPreview.title: Recording Preview
cameraPreview.description: Review your recorded video before saving. After clicking the "Save Video" button, the file will be downloaded. Move it to the public/media folder of the project to add it to the timeline.

voiceRecord.title: Audio Recording
voiceRecord.permissionDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow access in browser settings.
voiceRecord.deviceNotFound: Microphone not found. Please connect a device and try again.
voiceRecord.permissionError: Could not get access to microphone. Please check permission settings in your browser.
voiceRecord.hint: Click the record button to start. The recording will be automatically added to the media library.
voiceRecord.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio recording
voiceRecord.mediaDevicesNotSupported: Media devices are not supported in this browser

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts

templateDescriptions.split-vertical-landscape: Two screens divided by a vertical line
templateDescriptions.split-horizontal-landscape: Two screens divided by a horizontal line
templateDescriptions.split-diagonal-landscape: Two screens divided by a diagonal line
templateDescriptions.split-vertical-3-landscape: Three screens divided by vertical lines
templateDescriptions.split-horizontal-3-landscape: Three screens divided by horizontal lines
templateDescriptions.split-mixed-1-landscape: One screen on top, two screens below
templateDescriptions.split-mixed-2-landscape: One screen on the left, two screens on the right
templateDescriptions.split-vertical-4-landscape: Four screens divided by vertical lines
templateDescriptions.split-1-3-landscape: One screen on the left, three screens on the right
templateDescriptions.split-3-1-landscape: Three screens on top, one screen below
templateDescriptions.split-3-1-right-landscape: Three screens on the left, one screen on the right
templateDescriptions.split-1-3-bottom-landscape: One screen on top, three screens below
templateDescriptions.split-diagonal-cross-landscape: Four screens divided by diagonal lines in a cross shape
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-1-landscape: One large screen on the left, four screens on the right (2 top, 2 bottom)
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-2-landscape: One large screen on the right, four screens on the left (2 top, 2 bottom)
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-3-landscape: Two screens on top, one in the middle, two screens below

settings.savedDescription: Your settings have been saved successfully

screenshots.title: Screenshot Settings
screenshots.description: Configure settings for generating and processing video screenshots
screenshots.intervalDescription: Time between screenshots in seconds. Lower values create more screenshots.
screenshots.maxScreenshotsDescription: Limit the total number of screenshots that can be generated. Disable for unlimited screenshots.
screenshots.initialCountDescription: Number of screenshots to generate when first processing a video.
screenshots.pathDescription: Directory where screenshots will be saved.
screenshots.objectDetectionDescription: Enable AI-powered object detection in screenshots.
screenshots.confidenceThresholdDescription: Minimum confidence level for detected objects. Higher values reduce false positives.

chat.noMessages: 没有消息。开始一段对话。

recommendations.quicksync: Intel QuickSync provides good balance of quality and speed

cache.confirmClearPreview: Clear preview cache? This may slow down media file operations.
